hopobject.name: DistributedTemperature
hopobject.pname: Distributed Temperature using Lua and DDS
hopobject.body: Publish the temperature data over DDS and make it available to anyone with a smartphone. The goal of this project is to use as many technologies as possible. Hopefully one of them will be useful for others!
hopobject.shortdesc: Publish the temperature data over DDS and make it available to anyone with a smartphone.
